description: Test suite for reasoning_content generation in different Agent configurations, verifying proper population of reasoning_content attribute in responses under various modes and models.

methods.name: _show_output
methods.description: Fixture to capture and display output during tests.

methods.name: test_reasoning_true_non_streaming
methods.description: Test that reasoning_content is populated in non-streaming mode with reasoning=True.

methods.name: test_reasoning_true_streaming
methods.description: Test that reasoning_content is populated in streaming mode with reasoning=True.

methods.name: test_reasoning_model_non_streaming
methods.description: Test that reasoning_content is populated in non-streaming mode with a specified reasoning_model.

methods.name: test_reasoning_model_streaming
methods.description: Test that reasoning_content is populated in streaming mode with a specified reasoning_model.
